sentences.en: And the Yankees had been driven out of Georgia, back into Tennessee.
sentences.cn: 结果北方佬被赶出佐治亚, 退回到田纳西去了.

sentences.en: Did the gentlemen think the Yankees would ever get through with reconstructing Georgia?
sentences.cn: 他们问男人们,北方佬改造佐治亚,还有完没完?

sentences.en: Every visitor to Georgia is overwhelmed by the kindness, charm and hospitality of the people.
sentences.cn: 来到佐治亚州的每位游客都被当地人的善良、可爱和热情好客所深深打动。

sentences.en: Georgia certainly didn't seem to be a fool.
sentences.cn: 乔治娅当然不像是个傻瓜.

sentences.en: Georgia refuses to give up any territory.
sentences.cn: 格鲁吉亚拒绝出让任何领土。

sentences.en: He says the new document will guar-antee fairness for blacks in Georgia.
sentences.cn: 他说这个新文件将保证佐治亚州的黑人受到公平对待。

sentences.en: I don't know what's got into Georgia recently — she's so bad tempered.
sentences.cn: 我不知道乔治娅最近怎么了─她脾气很坏.

sentences.en: In the past week alone we have lost about ten colleagues, in Georgia and in Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 仅仅上星期在乔治亚州和阿富汗我们就已经失去了大约十名同事。

sentences.en: Let freedom ring from Stone Mountain of Georgia!
sentences.cn: 让自由的回声响彻佐治亚州的斯通山吧!

sentences.en: Mr White teaches first grade in south Georgia.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生在佐治亚州南部教一年级。

sentences.en: So the Georgia state troops are the only reinforcements Johnston can get.
sentences.cn: 所以,佐治亚州本州的部队就是约翰斯顿所能得到的唯一增援了.

sentences.en: The 26th Olympiad took place in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 第26届奥运会是在佐治亚州的亚特兰大举办的。

sentences.en: The cen-tennial Olympics will be in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 百年奥运盛典将在佐治亚州亚特兰大举行。

sentences.en: The centennial Olympics will be in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.cn: 百年奥运盛典将在佐治亚州亚特兰大举行。

sentences.en: The house had a fabulous view out to the Strait of Georgia and the Rockies beyond.
sentences.cn: 在这座房子里能看到乔治亚海峡和海峡那边落基山脉的壮美风景。

sentences.en: Why was the place so different from the other Georgia towns?
sentences.cn: 为什么这个地方跟旁的佐治亚市镇那么不一样 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 格鲁吉亚（前苏联加盟共和国）；乔治亚州；乔治娅（女子名）

phrases.tran_cn: 乔治亚理工学院（美国大学）
南乔治亚岛（南大西洋一岛屿）

trans.tran_cn: 美国佐治亚州，格鲁吉亚（前苏联加盟共和国），乔治娅（女子名）
